show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Can chlorophyll prevent cancer? Can probiotics prevent a heart attack? <!--more--> If sweets increase inflammation, what prevents inflammation?
Sugary sodas increase fat in surprising places.
Can you die of a broken heart?
The medical use of insects Callers: Bobby (NJ): H.
pylori...
normal to have it.
Can be healthy to protect against inflammation in gut.
Problem if an ulcer, but other things to try before resorting to antibiotics.
The hormone, Leptin, is important for appetite regulation and low leptin levels are related to lower incidence of heart attacks.
 James (CA): PLAC test for LP-PIAZ blood test results may indicate risk for stroke.
Discussed live blood cell analysis and vascular stiffness test and heart rate variability test.

Vicki’s 20:20 Health Tips: Growing older Observations on growing older ….. LOL
